Damages (losses). - NIST CSF 2.0: Govern/Identify (risks), Protect/Detect/Respond/Recover (mitigate negligence). - NIST SP 800-53 Rev. 5 key controls: RA-3 (Risk Assessment), AC-2/AC-6 (Access Control), AU-6 (Audit), SC-7/SC-28 (Protection), SI-2 (Flaw Remediation) – fulfill duty of care. - Integration: GDPR (Art. 32), HIPAA (Safeguards); strategies: insurance, audits.
